root: ^MY CALCULATIONS TELL ME THAT THERE IS A 99.83% CHANCE THAT YOU MIGHT HAVE A MESSAGE FOR ME? WITH 110% CHANCE OF BEING FROM MAGNAPHYTE.
^I FEEL SUCH A FOOL FOR STILL HAVING FEELINGS FOR THEM. WITHOUT THEM… I AM NOTHING… JUST A BIG PILE OF RUSTED METAL AND BUSTED CIRCUITS.
^I JUST WISH THEY KNEW HOW MUCH I-
^NEVERMIND… TELL ME, LITTLE MESSENGER, ARE MY CALCULATIONS CORRECT?
^Your calcl… calcola… You are right and a gift from Magnaphyte!
^A MESSAGE AND A GIFT FROM MAGNAPHYTE?! OH HOW EXCITING MY CIRCUITS ARE IN OVERDRIVE. OH! WHA– WHAT COULD THIS MEAN?!

c-0: ^They feel bad about what they have done to you.
^AS NICE AS IT MAY SOUND I DOUBT THAT MAGNAPHYTE WOULD COME TO THAT CONCLUSION ALL BY THEIR SINGLETON. REGARDLESS I APPRECIATE THE SENTIMENT.
^THANK YOU FOR DELIVERING THIS TO ME. YOU ARE SO GOOD AT THIS JOB.
^Thanks. It is almost as if I was born to do it.
^IM GONNA NEED TIME PROCESSING AN ACCEPTABLE THANK YOU LETTER FOR MAGNAPHYTE SO PLEASE DO COME BACK TOMORROW.
c-1: ^IM GONNA NEED TIME TO PROCESS THIS… I WILL HAVE A LETTER TOMORROW SO UH… CONSIDER YOUR DUTIES DONE FOR THE DAY. YOU MAY GO.
^I AM GIVING YOU AN ORDER!! LEAVE!
